channel.title: Squarespace modification stopped working
channel.description:
Hi Caue
Hope you are well.
You did a small Squarespace modification for me about a year ago. It was adding thumbnails to the blog page on my website: http://www.formulate.com.au/blog/.
I’ve just posted another blog entry (“Is inline validation out?”) and the thumbnail is not showing. Can you help me work out what’s wrong?
Many thanks,
Jessica Enders

item.title: Squarespace modification stopped working
item.dc:creator: @jessica jessica
item.description:
@jessica wrote:

Thanks Caue.

Take care,

Jessica Enders
Principal

Read full topic

item.title: Squarespace modification stopped working
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Sorry about the email, that was a huge mistake indeed, I really haven't realised!

It may still help you on debugging if you know the error wasn't showing up outside the live blog. When I made a new test blog, there was no such issue there.

Read full topic

item.title: Squarespace modification stopped working
item.dc:creator: @jessica jessica
item.description:
@jessica wrote:

Hi Caue

I appreciate you taking some time to look into this. I don’t appreciate that you published a test blog post live to my site, which then triggered an email to my 200+ subscribers with a link to said test blog post. It’s an embarrassing and surprising mistake.

I think I’ll take it from here, thanks.

Jessica Enders
Principal
Formulate Information Design
1300 85 44 11
PO Box 24121
Melbourne VIC 3001
http://formulate.com.au
@Formulate on Twitter

Read full topic

item.title: Squarespace modification stopped working
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Well, it's clearly something going wrong with the JSON squarespace is generating. I'm not sure, however, what's causing this although it's certainly not the script.

Might be a good idea trying to get in touch with their support.

Read full topic

item.title: Squarespace modification stopped working
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

So, following this I suppose:

Squarespace template modification

Hi Caue I'm more concerned about IE than many because one of my main target audiences is government, and they are often stuck with IE8, IE9 etc. Even though for my site it is only about 2% users from IE8 and 3% from IE9, this is a risky audience to alienate, as they are actually the ones that hire me. But I'm happy with how it looks like it will render on IE9, and I think I just have to give up on IE8. Thanks for all your work on this project. I've just paid the remaining $USD42. All the b…

As you may know, I'm unfortunately not working with this any longer...

But I did take some time to take a look at this. I was surprised to see I still had access to your admin and noticed the blog entry you were talking about is a draft. So I did a quick test and noticed the error. There is something wrong and weird going on indeed. The thumbnail doesn't show and there is a console error which I won't be able to debug right now.

Just want to let you know I'll try again and see what I can do as quickly as possible, but it may take some time.

Read full topic
